It’s been a long, long, long time
 How could I ever have lost you
 When I loved you?

George is singing about God. George was a Hindu, so it is not the Judeo-Christian God, but George himself would often use “God” instead of “Krishna”- see “All Those Years Ago” as an example.

George refers to a lapse in his faith. He loved God, but still “lost” contact with him.

Kanye West recounts a similar separation from God in “Jesus Walks”.

And I don’t think there’s nothin' I can do now to right my wrongs
I wanna talk to God but I’m afraid cause we ain’t spoke in so long
